snippet: Torture is widespread in Libyan jails run by militias that toppled the Qaddafi government in 2011, according to a United Nations report released Tuesday.
abstract: United Nations report reveals that torture is widespread in Libyan jails, which are run by militias that toppled Qaddafi government in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Torture is widespread in Libyan jails run by militias that toppled the Qaddafi government in 2011, according to a United Nations report released Tuesday.

headline.main: Libya: 27 Tortured to Death in Jails Run by Militias, U.N. Report Says
headline.print_headline: Libya: 27 Tortured to Death in Jails Run by Militias, U.N. Report Says

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
